sn17.30:1.2: “Yopi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu araham khinasavo tassapaham labhasakkarasiloko antarayaya vadami”ti.
sn17.30:1.3: Evam vutte, ayasma anando bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn17.30:1.4: “kissa pana, bhante, khinasavassa bhikkhuno labhasakkarasiloko antarayaya”ti?
sn17.30:1.5: “Ya hissa sa, ananda, akuppa cetovimutti naham tassa labhasakkarasilokam antarayaya vadami.
sn17.30:1.6: Ye ca khvassa, ananda, appamattassa atapino pahitattassa viharato ditthadhammasukhavihara adhigata tesahamassa labhasakkarasilokam antarayaya vadami.
sn17.30:1.7: Evam daruno kho, ananda, labhasakkarasiloko katuko pharuso antarayiko anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamaya.
sn17.30:1.9: ‘uppannam labhasakkarasilokam pajahissama, na ca no uppanno labhasakkarasiloko cittam pariyadaya thassati’ti.
